title: Keyple component 'org.eclipse.keyple:keyple-card-calypso-java-lib:2.0.1' does not work with prepareReadRecordFile()
body:
Hello, 

I started building my Java application for Keyple. Reference is https://keyple.org/learn/build-your-first-app/java-app/.
Step-by-step approach in link really helpful and I could able to build and run my first application. :)

I went ahead and added a read record of contract list file after open secure session. Code snippet below, 
        logger.info(
                "=============== Read a file ==================");

        final byte SFI_CONTRACT_LIST = (byte) 0x1E;

        // Performs file reads using the card transaction manager in non-secure mode.
        cardTransactionManager
                .prepareReadRecordFile(
                        SFI_CONTRACT_LIST, RECORD_NUMBER_1);

I assume I have used the method correctly.

When I ran the code this gave me an error "6988" Incorrect Terminal Session MAC. Attached is the log.
[Read_Record_keyple-card-calypso-java-lib2_0_1.txt](https://github.com/eclipse/keyple-website/files/7826961/Read_Record_keyple-card-calypso-java-lib2_0_1.txt)
After doing some walk through I modified the build.gradle and changed the version of card-calypso-java-lib to 2.0.3.
After this modification the code started working. Attached is the working log as well.
[Read_Record_keyple-card-calypso-java-lib2_0_3.txt](https://github.com/eclipse/keyple-website/files/7826963/Read_Record_keyple-card-calypso-java-lib2_0_3.txt)

If the above resolution is correct then I would request you to modify the build.gradle at https://keyple.org/learn/build-your-first-app/java-app/

If you need any further information then do let me know.

Regards, 
Bhushan
